plot: Two people stand on a road, out of focus. Seen distorted through a glass, they retire upstairs to a bedroom where she undresses. He says, &"Adieu.&" Images: the beautiful girl, a starfish in a jar, city scenes, newspapers, tugboats. More images: starfish, the girl. &"How beautiful she is.&" Repeatedly. He advances up the stair, knife in hand, starfish on the step. Three people stand on a road, out of focus. &"How beautiful she was.&" &"How beautiful she is.&" &"Beautiful.&"   Written by  David Carless
title: L'étoile de mer
